definition: Li Jilan 李季蘭|李季兰[Li3 Ji4 Lan2] or Li Ye (713-784), Tang dynasty female poet
plum
surname Li
to smelt/to cast/seductive in appearance

sentences.english: On this basis, further analyzing the art features of Li Ye's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，再詳細分析李冶詩歌的藝術特徵。

sentences.english: Chapter III is the analysis of the creative features of Li Ye's poems.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，分析李冶詩歌的創作特色。

sentences.english: Chapter II is about the contents and spread fo Li Ye's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，考辨李冶詩歌的流傳及篇目。

sentences.english: Chapter IV investigates the influence of Li Ye's poems and her own image in the future.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，探討李冶詩歌及其本身形象在後世的影響。
